example.text: Extreme MAGA Republicans are playing politics and recklessly threatening a default on our debt that will put livelihoods at risk and cause millions of jobs to be lost.

Led a bipartisan letter supporting the Biden Administration's efforts to remove Iran from the United Nations Commission on the Status of Women. I'm pleased that Iran has now been removed from the commission.

Despite testing positive for COVID, I was still able to work remotely and vote by proxy on some key legislative items this week. Here are a few updates: I voted to send the Respect for Marriage Act to President Biden's desk for signature.

Democrats delivered historic climate action last year. Since then, we've already seen over 100,000 clean energy jobs announced across America. MAGA Republicans? They're threatening to crash the economy and default on our bills unless they can undo this progress.

I joined a House Judiciary Committee hearing on the Supreme Court and called for a Supreme Court code of ethics. Watch my full remarks below: REP. LIEU DISCUSSES SCOTUS ETHICS AND JUSTICES MISLEADING THE PUBLIC ON ROE V WADE IN JUDICIARY HEARING ICYMI: I spoke with NBC Asian America about what it means to become the first Asian American ever elected to the Vice Chair position within the House Democratic Caucus.

Led a bipartisan letter supporting the Biden Administration's efforts to remove Iran from the United Nations Commission on the Status of Women. I'm pleased that Iran has now been removed from the commission.

This bill will ensure critical protections for same-sex and interracial marriages. The House passed the Veteran Service Recognition Act to make the naturalization process easier for active duty servicemembers so that they never have to experience the fear of deportation.
